EmailTemplate.description: Invitation to parents to opening ceremony of upper campus
EmailTemplate.name: Email to Parents about Opening Ceremony of New Campus
EmailTemplate.subject: Opening Ceremony of the New Building on Thursday 14th November
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The British School of Tashkent Part of The British Schools Group
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
The British School of Tashkent cordially invites you to the Opening ceremony of the new building.
The Opening ceremony will take place on Thursday 14th November at 11 am at the Primary campus.
Looking forward to see you all!
Уважаемые родители,
Британская школа в Ташкенте приглашает вас на официальную церемонию открытия нового здания.
Церемония открытия пройдет в четверг, 14 ноября в 11 часов утра на территории нового кампуса школы.
С нетерпением ждем встречи с вами!
Regards,
Administration Team
The British School of Tashkent World Class Education
__________________________________________________________ Beijing - Kuala Lumpur - Sao Paulo - Manila - Moscow - Guangzhou - Nanjing - Tashkent - Pamplona -Marbella
